full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
========================
### Solicitation Title and Details

**Solicitation ID**: WS3989861152
**Reference Number**: WS3989861152
**Amendment Number**: 0
**Publication Date**: May 12, 2023
**Notice Closing Date**: June 28, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT (Deadline revised, please disregard original posting)

### Industry Classification & Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tender Description and Requirements

The Government of Canada, represented by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), Western Region, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, invites qualified suppliers to submit bids for the Regional Individual Standing Offers for the supply, delivery, and offloading of miscellaneous groceries on an as-and-when-requested basis to CFB Wainwright in Denwood, Alberta.

### Key Contractual Details

* **Contract Period**: Six months from August 1, 2023, to January 31, 2024, with applicable refresh and rebid periods.
* **Refresh and Rebid Periods**: As indicated in Annex B of the document.
* **Supply and Delivery**: To CFB Wainwright in Denwood, Alberta.

### Supporting Documentation

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery by June 28, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT.

### Tender Submission Requirements

Please disregard the original posting deadline. All bids submitted after 2:00 p.m. EDT will be declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

For more details and a comprehensive view of the requirements, please consult the official solicitation document posted on Ariba Discovery at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16264040?extsite=MTYyNjQwNDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16264040?extsite=MTYyNjQwNDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

 Should you have any inquiries, please contact Rina Marsland, Marsland.Rina@TPSGC-PWGSC.gc.ca. We look forward to your participation in this tender
